name: Mike Sullivan
funny_story: Once tried to play a round in flip-flops and somehow shot his best score ever.

name: Dave Chen
funny_story: Calculated the exact wind speed before every putt in 2022. Still three-putted on 18.

name: Rob Jenkins
funny_story: Wore his lucky Hawaiian shirt every round in 2021. The group voted to ban it.

name: Jason Park
funny_story: Hit a bird mid-flight off the tee on hole 7. The group still argues about whether it was a birdie.

name: Tony Ramirez
funny_story: Brought a Bluetooth speaker shaped like a golf ball. It rolled into a pond on day one.

name: Pete Dawson
funny_story: Tried to skip a ball across the water hazard on a dare. It worked. He still lost the hole.

name: Brad Kowalski
funny_story: Showed up to the 2023 trip with brand new clubs still in the plastic wrap.

name: Nick Ortega
funny_story: Brings homemade salsa to every trip. Nobody golfs well the morning after Nick's habanero batch.

name: Alan Briggs
funny_story: Keeps a detailed spreadsheet of every shot he's ever taken on the trip. It's 47 tabs.

name: Marcus Hall
funny_story: Accidentally drove the cart onto the wrong course. Played three holes before anyone noticed.

name: Will Tanner
funny_story: Applied so much sunscreen he left white handprints on every club he touched.

name: Greg Nash
funny_story: Fell asleep in the cart on hole 12. His partner played the rest of the round solo.

name: Kyle Thompson
funny_story: Lost 14 balls in one round and still says it was 'a solid day out there.'

name: Ryan McBride
funny_story: Wore the same 'lucky' polo every single day of the 2023 trip. Nobody sat near him by day three.

name: Sam Rivera
funny_story: His slice is so consistent the group uses it to navigate. 'Just aim at Sam's ball and go left.'

name: Derek Foster
funny_story: Won the putting contest despite holding the putter backwards. Claims it's his technique.

name: Leo Grant
funny_story: Gave a 10-minute lecture on swing mechanics on the first tee. Shot 112.

name: Chris Wells
funny_story: Insisted on playing in cowboy boots. Shot 120 but looked great doing it.

name: Omar Hassan
funny_story: Aced a par 3 on his very first trip. The group has resented him ever since.

name: Travis Dunn
funny_story: Brought his own custom flag for whenever he made par. Used it twice all weekend.

name: Jared Miles
funny_story: Challenged everyone to a chipping contest in the hotel parking lot at 11pm. Security was called.

name: Connor Walsh
funny_story: Showed up with a set of clubs from 1987 that he found at a garage sale. The bag had no strap.

name: Matt Ingram
funny_story: Calmest guy on the course. Sank a 40-foot putt to win and just said 'neat.'

name: Zach Perry
funny_story: Claims he once hit a 350-yard drive. Nobody else saw it. There were no witnesses. The ball was never found.

name: Eli Morgan
funny_story: Packed six different pairs of golf shoes for a three-day trip. Wore sandals the whole time.

name: Drew Campbell
funny_story: Tried to use a rangefinder on a 90-yard shot. It locked onto a deer instead.

name: Ben Larson
funny_story: Ate Nick's habanero salsa before the morning round. Did not finish the morning round.

name: Victor Duarte
funny_story: Rookie year. Showed up with only a 7-iron and a putter. 'I'll figure it out,' he said. He did not.

name: Ian Cole
funny_story: First-timer. Hit his opening tee shot backwards. The group gave him a standing ovation.

name: Nate Bishop
funny_story: Brought a GoPro to film his swing. The only footage was him tripping getting out of the cart.

name: Paul Richter
funny_story: Bought a round of drinks for everyone after making his first par. It was hole 16.
